path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Blockcelerate QuarkChain - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: A01.Personal Cap Overflow
findings.description: The cap calculation will always revert if the crowdsale is running long-enough due to multiplication overflow.

findings.title: Potential Multiplication Overflow
findings.description: The cap calculation may revert due to multiplication overflow if the crowdsale is running long enough, which can lead to practical issues.
